TopicTitle: Allow takeoff from both ends of the runway.

Articles.Content:
Currently, all you can select is runway 1 and 2. If you look on the runway lettering in game though, the runways show 09R/27L and 09L/27R. It would make more since to have a selection from both ends, since if you want to fly west, you have to make a long 180 turn.

In real life, planes take off from both ends of the runway, and they are named accordingly.
